Desc.entry: Situated in the heart of the rural Mayfield Valley the centre provides educational countryside experiences for children. Surrounded by a great diversity of habitats, the centre is ideally located for environmental education experiences and specific studies related to the National Curriculum. Amenities include classroom facilities for 70 children, provision of outdoor clothing and wellingtons for children and adults, fieldwork equipment, reference materials, slides, photographs and follow up activities. Also offers training courses for teachers and group leaders. The venue may also be booked for meetings, workshops and regular group activities.
